title: Quickbooks POS 6.0 ** PRO ** FULL
description:
Sick of dealing with Intuit to let me activate my legitimate copy of QB POS 6.0 PRO on my new PC, I&#039;m sharing it.  Hopefully someone will post a valid License and telephone auth code.

The license number is in the format: ####-####-####-###
The product ID: 708-224  (This is not PREMIER as posted in the other torrents - this is PRO)

FYI: Product ID for BASIC: 255-702

If someone could crack or share the serial that would be great!


I used NERO to burn the image. (NRG format)


About QB POS 6.0 Pro: 

Offer your customers the individualized service they deserve and avoid manual paperwork to track their special requests. Easily manage special inventory orders within Point of Sale. Accept layaway payments to allow customers to pay over time for big-ticket purchases. Track backorders and other special orders without keeping manual records. Easily manage and track items sold as a group such as kits or gift baskets. Assign a primary vendor and up to four alternate vendors for every item including different UPC codes and unit costs to simplify buying from multiple sources. Any of an item&#039;s vendors can be listed on purchase orders to streamline purchasing and the correct unit cost will automatically be suggested. List items on sales receipts using any of the five UPC codes. QuickBooks Point of Sale is the fast and easy way to gain total control over your inventory with real-time tracking and easy-to-use insightful reports. Get the facts you need to make smarter buying decisions. Fast and easy reports help you track what&#039;s selling well and what&#039;s not - up to 50 000 different items! Real-time data keeps you up to date with what&#039;s in stock and what needs reordering. Turn your inventory faster by stocking more of the items your customers purchase most to help maximize the profitability of your inventory investment. With a familiar point-and-click Windows interface QuickBooks Point of Sale makes ringing up sales fast and easy for you and your employees. Ring up sales quickly and easily by scanning bar codes. Create your own bar codes and price tags to help ensure accurate pricing. Easy customer tracking stores key information such as mailing and e-mail addresses and purchase histories that help you know your customers better. Fast and easy customer history helps you see a customer&#039;s favorite items. Knowing your customers helps you serve them better - so they stay your customers.
